name: Star Ghost
overview: Star Ghost is an exciting evolution of the side-scrolling shoot-em-up. Patrol 12 star systems in the most advanced star fighter ever built. Navigate the perilous fragments of exploding planets, survive intense asteroid fields and dogfight with deadly Sentinel ships as you defend against the relentless onslaught of the formidable Metagon empire. We are all counting on you Commander. It's time to save the human race! Featuring: Dynamic level generation 12 beautifully rendered Star Systems Sound track by renowned composer, David Wise Simple, intuitive control system Off-TV play
